# canZoomIn

**Instance Property**

Returns a Boolean value indicating whether the user can magnify the view and zoom in.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var canZoomIn: Bool { get }
```

## Zooming in a PDF View

- **zoomIn(_:)**: Zooms in by increasing the scaling factor.
- **zoomOut(_:)**: Zooms out by decreasing the scaling factor.
- **canZoomOut**: Returns a Boolean value indicating whether the user can view an expanded area and zoom out.

items.description: Zooms in by increasing the scaling factor.

items.description: Zooms out by decreasing the scaling factor.
